title: Pour-Over Coffee Brewer 2015 | KitchenAid
description: Our new Pour-Over Coffee Brewer combines the art of manual craftmanship with the convenience of automated technology. By mimicking the pour-over process of professional baristas, the brewer extracts bright, full-flavored coffee. Learn how you can capture more layers of flavors.

asset.author: KitchenAid
asset.hookText: Our new Pour-Over Coffee Brewer combines the art of manual craftmanship with the convenience of automated technology. By mimicking the pour-over process of professional baristas, the brewer extracts bright, full-flavored coffee. Learn how you can capture more layers of flavors at http://www.kitchenaid.com/countertop-appliances/craft-coffee/.
